link.description: Arrival essentials ease your first steps in Japan by covering airport navigation (grabbing a SIM card, exchanging for cash, and setting up a transit card), directions from the airport to your temporary housing via efficient trains or buses, quick setup of IC cards like Suica or Pasmo for seamless public transport, and key pitfalls to avoid upon landing (skip Uber initially due to high costs and restrictions, and hold back on over-speaking to respect local customs).
